story.headline: Dow and Nasdaq Close Up
story.summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average and NASDAQ Composite Index close up for the day
story.content:
New York July 30, 2001 - Stocks rose during an unusually brisk session Tuesday as more companies indicated that tough times are nowhere on the horizon.
Analysts attributed the strong movements to investors' optimism after hearing some bright earnings reports from key index companies. With the news, investors jumped headfirst into commitments in a business environment that shows no signs of turning down.
The Dow Jones Industrial average rose 37.95, its fourth straight gain.
Broader stock indexes also jumped. The Standard and Poor's 500 index rose 10.20, while the Nasdaq rose 15.03.
